feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: atoms build inferred types by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20409
  • fix: system booking field is not translated in calendar event by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20410
  • chore: small changes to referral embed by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20419
  • feat: Prevent watchlisted entities from creating bookings by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19107
  • fix: Flaky organization.spec.ts test for i.cal.com by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20421
  • fix: 500 error on missing response id. Should be 400 by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20420
  • refactor: v2 team event type assignAllTeamMembers by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20400
  • feat: Salesforce - Fallback to Lead if Contact Isn't Found For Routing by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20423
  • fix: Dsync group table formatting by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20422
  • chore: [Snyk] Security upgrade next from 13.5.7 to 13.5.9 by @pumfleet in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20412
  • chore: Move CRM owner calls handleResponse by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19316
  • fix: wrong dates on OOO due to summer time by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20408
  • fix: Follow Up for dub referrral embed by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20427
  • chore: Upgrade lingo.dev by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20430
  • fix: add checkAdminOrOwner by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20429

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.10...v5.1.11

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20432
  • chore: bump platform by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20436
  • fix: atom builds by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20437
  • fix: Intercom app team/org validation by @vachmara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20431
  • fix: send email to is not being displayed in routing forms by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20444
  • fix: calendar cache date mismtach by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20446
  • feat: allow plain ask a question for paid users only by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20390
  • fix: middleware config matcher by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20450
  • chore: don't log the whole delegated credential by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20452
  • feat: implement filter segment by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20066
  • perf: move stripe to billing service out of app store by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20376
  • docs: v2 authorization headers by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20453
  • fix: theme-flickering by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20460
  • fix: booking filtering queryParams by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20447
  • fix: SCIM - Add users to event types when provisioned [CAL-5381] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20465
  • fix: eventTypeId filter on Download at /insights by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20463
  • test: embed e2e tests for mobile viewport and hideEventTypeDetails=true by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20445

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.11...v5.1.12

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: User fields response not populated in HubSpot by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20458
  • fix: trigger Lingo.dev for a translation not picked up by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20468
  • fix: trigger Lingo.dev for a translation not picked up by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20472
  • fix: form builder dark mode by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20474
  • fix: add missing DataTableProvider by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20473
  • fix: trigger lingo.dev by removing duplicate value by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20475
  • chore: update status code by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20443
  • chore: Allow tracing orphaned event types (added id) by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20479
  • feat: refactor handleCancelBooking to not have next request by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20241

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.12...v5.1.13

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: implement booking page error boundary by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20492
  • perf: Remove ssrInit completely by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20439
  • chore: Salesforce - handle checkbox type fields by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20490
  • chore: do not route to meeting-ended page for daily link used for testing by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20371
  • feat: v3/UI docs by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20454
  • feat: support Filter Segment in other pages by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20461
  • fix: google signin getting started redirect by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20501
  • fix: Correct import of markdownToSafeHtml on the client by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18195
  • fix: switch saveMode for SaveFilterSegmentButton by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20502
  • chore: set x-request-id in response header for exeptions apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20505
  • fix: removes additional space on top and bottom by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20503
  • refactor: v2 access and refresh tokens by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20486
  • fix: v2 filter out ooo days out of slots by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20303
  • chore: Add spam checking for workflow bodies by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18822
  • fix: v2 bookings attendeeEmail filter by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20506
  • feat: allow conferencing apps to be installed on teams by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19784
  • chore: refactor to use createRouterCaller util by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20494

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.13...v5.1.14

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: CalProvider by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20508
  • fix: add oauth client id to table identifier on platform managed user list by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20513
  • refactor: extract NextRequest from handle new booking by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20082
  • fix: Add to calendar feature not working properly by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20515
  • fix: firstname lastname identifiers by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20480
  • fix: v2 allow creating team events without hosts by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20520
  • chore: bridge logs api v2 <-> libraries by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20440
  • fix: keep search term on the url (DataTableToolbar.SearchBar) by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20521
  • chore: Booker Header - selectedDateString could be null by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20517
  • feat: v2 return booking icsUid by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20527
  • feat: max-seats-per-time-slot by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20213
  • feat: options to disable cancelling and/or rescheduling by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20489
  • feat: Update @dub/analytics to support domainsConfig.refer by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20495
  • fix: don't display user event types with no owner by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20525
  • feat: get org bookings endpoint api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20462
  • chore: Update favicon for docs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20532

New Contributors

  • @romitg2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20480

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.14...v5.1.15
